attributes.additional_details:
T's & C's and legal jargon are either printed too small and in incompatible colours, excessively long or in the case of verbally are spoken so fast that it's impossible to understand.
It is essential that people understand Properly all the T's & C's associated with all  products.  

MAKE  ALL T's &C's  CLEAR AND  CONCISE
attributes.background:
Remove small print. 
Make all T's & C's and legal jargon the same size and duration as the main advertisement.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about advertising standards are a matter for the Advertising Standards Authority (ASA), not the Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about the ASA here: https://www.asa.org.uk/
